archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SWE.1.BP6 Establish bidirectional traceability
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish bidirectional traceability between system requirements and software requirements. Establish bidirectional traceability between the system architecture and software requirements. NOTE 8: Redundancy should be avoided by establishing a combination of these approaches that covers the project and the organizational needs. NOTE 9: Bidirectional traceability supports coverage, consistency and impact analysis.
